alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 30 at 3:19AM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches possible, with up to a foot above 8000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Buffalo Pass, Ganado and Window Rock. * WHEN...From late tonight through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Snow forecast from 5 AM Friday to 11 AM Saturday: Buffalo Pass 4 to 8 inches Ganado 2 to 4 inches Window Rock 2 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
